tool_description: Time-based and one time codes for verifying phone numbers
name: otpninja
title: otpninja

api_list.name: Verify an otp
api_list.description: Verify the code your user provides.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://otpninja.p.rapidapi.com/rapidapi/otp/verify"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "otpninja.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Trigger an otp
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to send a SMS message with the code to your customers
api_list.code:

url = "https://otpninja.p.rapidapi.com/rapidapi/otp/trigger"
